suppress.notes: CVE-2022-22965 (Spring4Shell): Not exploitable in this project context. Exploit requires: JDK 9+ AND WAR deployment on Tomcat. This app uses: JDK 8 AND executable JAR packaging. The known exploit path is blocked by our runtime environment.
CVE-2021-22118: Not applicable - feature not used. This vulnerability affects Spring WebFlux applications only. This application uses Spring MVC, not WebFlux.
CVE-2022-22971: Not applicable - feature not used. Requires STOMP over WebSocket endpoints. This application has no WebSocket endpoints configured.
CVE-2023-20873: Not applicable - deployment environment not used. This vulnerability only affects applications deployed to Cloud Foundry. This application is not deployed to Cloud Foundry.
CVE-2020-9488: Not applicable - component not configured. Affects Log4j SMTP appender only. This application does not configure or use the SMTP appender.

CVE-2021-42550: Not applicable in standard deployment. Exploitation requires attacker to have privileges to edit logback configuration files. In our deployment, configuration files are not writable by untrusted users.
CVE-2023-6378: Not applicable - component not used. Affects logback receiver component for remote logging. This application does not enable or use remote logging receivers.
CVE-2023-1932: Not applicable - feature not used. Requires use of @SafeHtml annotation in bean validation. This application does not use @SafeHtml validation.

CVE-2020-10693: Not applicable - feature not used. Requires user-controlled input in constraint violation messages with EL interpolation. This application does not include user input in validation error messages.
CVE-2025-35036: Not applicable - feature not used. Requires user-supplied input in constraint violation messages. This application does not interpolate user input in validation messages.

CVE-2023-35116: Not applicable - vendor disputed. Vendor states this requires constructing cyclic data structures and serializing them, which cannot be achieved by an external attacker. This application does not construct cyclic structures from untrusted input.

CVE-2016-1000027: Not applicable - untrusted deserialization not present. Vendor states untrusted data deserialization is not an intended use case. This application does not deserialize untrusted data via HttpInvoker or similar mechanisms.
